thread.title: Susannah Sanchez
thread.title_full: Electricity Monster reviewed by Susannah Sanchez

author: Susannah Sanchez
title: Susannah Sanchez
text: I was convinced I was making the right choice with going with their recommendation. And now I've been two days without power. First Energy doesn't know what the hell they're doing even though I have called them 6 times today I still don't have power.
